thread.title: Overseas remittances: CBI raids 50 places

author: tribuneindia.com
title: Overseas remittances: CBI raids 50 places
text:
Tribune News Service
New Delhi, October 11
The CBI today carried out searches at 50 locations in connection with suspicious overseas remittances involving 59 account holders of the Bank of Baroda (BoB), unidentified bank officials and private persons. The agency yesterday registered a case against the accused under Section 120-B (criminal conspiracy) read with 420 (cheating) of the IPC and Sections 13(2) and 13(1)(d) of the Prevention of Corruption Act, 1988, following a complaint by the bank authorities, a CBI spokesperson said. The CBI conducted searches along with a team of the Enforcement Directorate (ED).
